main.name: Animesh Anurag
main.description: I am a FrontEnd engineer and I use react and react native to develop pages. This Website is a showcase of my work.
main.bio: I am a web developer and designer. My passion is to create beautiful experiences. I spend my time experimenting and researching the latest technology. I pledge to be a lifelong learner; it empowers me to create magnificent products. I started learning HTML as a hobbyist, after witnessing its tremendous capabilities, I was blown away by its potential! Soon, I started learning React and React Native, A language with no limitations. Now I hope to design masterpieces using the skills I've learned.
main.contactmessage: Hey, I hope you liked my portfolio website. This was completely build using React and if you liked my work then you can reach out to me using methods given below

resume.skillmessage: Thank you for taking the time to review my resume. I truly believe that my past experience and education would make me a valuable asset for your organization. I'm particularly excited about the opportunity to learn more about web developement, app developement, UI and UX and how I can contribute to that effort. I believe that learning has no end, one can work hard and gain knowledge for lifetime.

education.school: SRM Institue Of Science and Technology, Kattankulathur

I did my Intermediate from Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics and secured 76% from CBSE Board.
